title: Giants of Brazilian soccer
author: VD
content_html:
Brazilians have long held a reputation for being the giants of football, now they can also lay claim to being the first country with a team made up entirely of dwarves…. The average size of the team is about 4ft, while the smallest player is just 3ft 3in.

This is awesome, the guy with the ball looks rather like Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink wearing a Ronaldinho wig. And their name is great too, Gigantes do Norte, Giants of the North. How can you not admire their spirit?
